name: Orbscure - GWJ #46
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #46 (a challenge to make a full game in 9 days)

The theme was: Orb

The wildcards (optional restrictions were:

- I Feel Small: Make enemies much larger than the player
- Fear of the Dark: Make someone (or something) follow the player
- Non-Euclidean: Have a map that is impossible in the real world

----------

This version has a bug, causing her clothes not to move. I'm still working on how to solve it.

What it should be:

With the bug, her clothes don't move with the wind, they just follow the body :(

-----------

Escape a confusing world using magic from your orbs! They can change colour, and each combination causes a spell.
